description: Number of appearances of n in sequence defined by b(k)=b(floor[k/3])+b(ceiling[k/3]) with b(0)=0 and b(1)=1, i.e. in A061392.
comments: In the binary expansion of n, delete everything left of the rightmost 1 bit, then interpret as ternary and add 1. - _Ralf Stephan_, Aug 22 2013
links: Michael Gilleland, Some Self-Similar Integer Sequences
R. Stephan, Table of generating functions
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 30 2001
